title: 6.20 ping issue
body: Today  on 18.10.2016.After the patch i started a game normally,and when we were in the loading screen i noticed that my ping is 160 (locked).I tought it wont be like this in game-but i was wrong.I've got 160 ms and i was like ok its only for 1 game it should be ok the next time-i restarted my PC and the router(also tried playing other online games like cs:go and paladins and everything was ok).So after i retarted my pc my router i tried again-still didn't work.(i tried it in custom games bcz i didnt want to troll the game or dc...) but the ping was still on 160.It wasn't unplayable but it's not enjoyable aswell.I'd like some advice about my problem :).GL-HF

replies.body: It does seem like your connection is having some problems, and it could be local or ISP related.  To really know for sure, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for a detailed analysis of what's going on.  You'll also find some troubleshooting specific to your case.  Let me know if you have any questions!
